HOUSING COMMITTEE
COMMITTEE MEETING
~ MINUTES ~
Thursday, June 3, 2021

10:00 AM

Sullivan Chamber

The Housing Committee will conduct a public hearing to discuss inclusionary zoning
preference/eligibility, and how the new state-level Housing Choice law will affect zoning in
Cambridge.
Attendee Name
E. Denise Simmons
Jivan Sobrinho-Wheeler
Alanna Mallon
Marc C. McGovern
Quinton Zondervan
Sumbul Siddiqui
Timothy J. Toomey
